titleInfo.title: 'File 28/13 Proposal by the A.P.O.C. to install a Petrol service station in Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are notes at the end of the file (folios 6-7). The notes refer to documents within the file; they give a brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation is in pencil in the top right corner of each folio. The numbering starts on the first folio with 1 and 1A; then 2, 3, 4 and 4A, and ends on the last folio, with 7.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representative, the Adviser to the Governement of Bahrain and the Political Agent in Basra on a proposal by the Anglo-Persian Oil Company (APOC) to install a petrol service station in Bahrain.
